caption_text: For p = O the zero moments follow exponential dependence with time while the average and variance are constant with time (Fig. 4). caption_text: Knowing the first three moments allows representation of the product FDF as a gamma function, as shown in Fig. 8 for a steady-state CSTR. The moment approach affords a good approximation to the exact solution (Table 1), which is restricted to m = O. For the other values of tk, the moment approach represents the general trend of the exact solution.
